QuestData.Title: Argent Crusade, We Are Leaving!
QuestData.Description: <The sergeant quickly reads through the orders you've handed him, a frown coming over his face.>$B$BLook, $g lad : lass;, I'd love to just up and leave, but take a look out there. All of my people are fighting.$B$BTell you what, you've come this far, you think you're up to doing me a small favor? Head out there and round up my soldiers?$B$BTell 'em that the sergeant orders them to report back immediately. Lend them a hand if you will.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Stackhammer at the Altar of Sseratus wants you to speak with 10 of his Argent Soldiers and tell them to report back to him.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'll need more of them to report back in than that.
QuestData.RewardText: Alright then. We'll collect up the rest and head back to the stand.$B$BIt's a shame that we have to leave so soon. Doesn't quite feel like the job's done here, and quite frankly, I get the feeling that prophet in front of the altar is going to be big trouble!

Objectives.Objective: Argent Soldiers told to report back to the sergeant
